data.text: “Wopɛ a frɛ, na hwan na ɔbɛgye wo soɔ?
Ahisɛm kum ɔkwasea,
Mʼankasa mahunu ɔkwasea a ɔrefefɛ,
Ne mma ne banbɔ ntam ɛkwan ware,
Deɛ ɛkɔm de noɔ no di ne nnɔbaeɛ,
Ahokyere mmpue mfiri dɔteɛ mu
Nanso wɔwo nnipa to ɔhaw mu
“Nanso sɛ ɛyɛ me a, anka mɛdwane atoa Onyankopɔn;
Ɔyɛ anwanwadeɛ a wɔntumi nhwehwɛ mu,
Ɔtɔ nsuo gu asase so;
Ɔde ahobrɛasefoɔ si deɛ ɛkorɔn,
Ɔsɛe anifirefoɔ nhyehyɛeɛ,
Ɔkyere anyansafoɔ wɔ wɔn anifire mu,
Esum duru wɔn awia ketee;
Ɔgye ahiafoɔ firi afena a ɛhyɛ wɔn anomu;
Enti, ahiafoɔ wɔ anidasoɔ,
“Nhyira ne onipa a Onyankopɔn tene no,
Ɛfiri sɛ, ɔno na ɔpira na ɔno ara akyekyere;
Ɔbɛgye wo afiri ɔhaw ahodoɔ nsia mu;
Ɛkɔm ba a, ɔbɛgye wo afiri owuo mu,
Wɔbɛbɔ wo ho ban afiri kasatwie ho
Wobɛsere ɔsɛeɛ ne ɔkɔm;
Wo ne afuo so aboɔ bɛyɛ apam,
Wobɛhunu sɛ wo ntomadan wɔ banbɔ;
Wobɛhunu sɛ wo mma bɛyɛ bebree;
Wode ahoɔden bɛkɔ damena mu,
